data.event: Bexley was an ancient parish of Kent, in the Diocese of Rochester, and under the Local Government Act 1894 formed part of Bexley Urban District.
The urban district gained further status in 1935 as a municipal borough.

event.title: 1965, London County Council was abolished and replaced

data.event: In 1965, London County Council was abolished and replaced by Greater London Council, with an expanded administrative area that took in the metropolitan parts of the Home Counties.
